name: School's Out!!
description:
A Projectile-based Fighting Game, set in a high school where students fight each other to beat their Teachers first to pass their exams.

Play as Aki, a student dead-set in finally passing all his exams to leave the school life behind and pursue his dreams. Defeat your enemy students by throwing your various school utensils and throw your expired bottle of soda to explode at their feet!

Dodge by jumping or ducking over and under your enemies attacks, or defend yourself whenever you need to, but be mindful of your Stamina!

Play against the computer in the Story Mode or Survival Mode, or face off against your friends in a Versus Match!
